directions: Place a large wok or skillet over low heat. Combine the lamb, onion, tomato, garlic paste, ginger paste, peppercorns, cinnamon, dried peppers, cloves, cardamom seeds, and salt in the pan and stir; cover and cook until the mutton is tender, 30 to 35 minutes. Stir in the ghee. Cook until the sauce has thickened, 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: 2 1/4 pounds boneless lamb shoulder, cut into 1 1/2 inch pieces
1/4 cup dried chile de arbol peppers
title: Muscat Gosht (Lamb in Spicy Tomato Gravy)
